mapper.sql: id, send_user_id, recipient_user_id, send_mode, status, create_time, update_time, reserve_column01, reserve_column02, reserve_column03, reserve_column04
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from message
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from message
order by ${orderByClause}

select DISTINCT lr.`user_id` as `likes_user_id`, lr.`create_time` as `likes_create_time`, di.`id` as `dyinfo_id` from `like_record` lr, `dynamic_info` di, `user` ur where lr.`dynamic_info_id` = di.`id` and di.`user_id` = ur.`id` and ur.`id` = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} order by lr.`create_time` desc

SELECT DISTINCT me.`content`, me.`send_user_id`, u.`head_icon`, u.`nick_name` FROM `message` me, `user` u WHERE me.`send_user_id` = u.`id` AND me.`reserve_column01` = 'applications' AND me.`reserve_column02` = '0' AND me.`reserve_column03` = '0' AND me.`recipient_user_id` = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY me.`create_time` DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `message` me, `user` u WHERE me.`send_user_id` = u.`id` AND me.`status` = '0' AND me.`reserve_column01` = 'applications' AND me.`reserve_column02` = '0' AND me.`reserve_column03` = '0' AND me.`recipient_user_id` = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY me.`create_time` DESC

SELECT DISTINCT me.`id` as `message_id`, user.`id`, user.`head_icon`, me.`content`, dynamic.`attache_type`, attache.`file_name` FROM `message` me, `user` user, `like_record` record, `dynamic_info` dynamic, `attache_info` attache WHERE me.`send_user_id` = user.`id` AND record.`user_id` = me.`send_user_id` AND record.`dynamic_info_id` = dynamic.`id` AND dynamic.`id` = attache.dynamic_info_by AND me.`reserve_column01` = 'likes' AND me.`recipient_user_id` = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND me.`reserve_column03` = '0' AND record.`status` = '0' GROUP BY user.`id`, me.`id` ORDER BY me.`create_time` DESC

SELECT `id`, `send_user_id`, `recipient_user_id`, `content`, `send_mode`, `status`, `create_time` FROM `message` WHERE `reserve_column01` = 'applications' AND `recipient_user_id` = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `reserve_column03` = '0' GROUP BY `send_user_id` ORDER BY `create_time` DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT `id`, `send_user_id`, `recipient_user_id`, `content`, `send_mode`, `status`, `create_time` FROM `message` WHERE `reserve_column01` = 'applications' AND `send_user_id` = #{sendUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `recipient_user_id` = #{recipientUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} UNION SELECT `id`, `send_user_id`, `recipient_user_id`, `content`, `send_mode`, `status`, `create_time` FROM `message` WHERE `reserve_column01` = 'applications' AND `send_user_id` = #{recipientUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `recipient_user_id` = #{sendUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ) AS a WHERE a.`status` = '0' ORDER BY a.`create_time` DESC

SELECT a.`id`, a.`send_user_id`, a.`recipient_user_id`, a.`content`, a.`send_mode`, a.`status`, a.`create_time` FROM ( SELECT `id`, `send_user_id`, `recipient_user_id`, `content`, `send_mode`, `status`, `create_time` FROM `message` WHERE `reserve_column01` != 'likes' AND `reserve_column03` = '0' AND `send_user_id` = #{sendUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `recipient_user_id` = #{recipientUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} UNION SELECT `id`, `send_user_id`, `recipient_user_id`, `content`, `send_mode`, `status`, `create_time` FROM `message` WHERE `reserve_column01` != 'likes' AND `reserve_column03` = '0' AND `send_user_id` = #{recipientUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `recipient_user_id` = #{sendUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ) AS a ORDER BY a.`create_time` DESC

select count(1) from `message` where `send_user_id` = #{sendUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and `recipient_user_id` = #{recipientUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and `reserve_column01` = 'applications' and `reserve_column02` = '1' and `send_mode` = '0' and `reserve_column04` is not null
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into message (send_user_id, recipient_user_id, send_mode, status create_time, update_time, reserve_column01, reserve_column02, reserve_column03, reserve_column04, content) values (#{sendUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recipientUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserveColumn01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveColumn02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveColumn03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveColumn04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

reserve_column04 = #{record.reserveColumn04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE message SET `status` = '1', update_time = NOW() WHERE `recipient_user_id` = #{recipientUserId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
